upkeep.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the process of keeping something in good condition
upkeep.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Most of the money is spent on the upkeep of the building.
upkeep.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the cost or process of looking after a child or animal and giving them the things they need
upkeep.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Poorer people find it hard to pay for their petâ€™s upkeep.
upkeep.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the care and money needed to keep something in good condition
upkeep.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: We are introducing a user fee to finance the building and upkeep of state roads.
